title: Submit account
heading: Submit account information
desc: Bithomp strive to increase the quality of the information provided by the wallet explorer and allow users to quickly identify relationships on the ledger. If you run a service using the Ledger (exchange, financial service provider, non-profit or any other business) or if you use such a service, Please submit that service information here.The submission is not meant for private accounts, personal account information submitted via this form will be discarded.
subtitle: Your information
info: Please provide your email address in case we need to contact you for your submittion's validation.
